We provide free food to individuals and families in the State of Washington. We serve everyone. On Saturday, you can choose fresh vegetables, fruit, meat, bread, dairy items, diapers, pet food, and pantry staples. Our friendly volunteers are here to help you feel comfortable and assist you. On most Saturdays, we have volunteers who can help with translating into Spanish, and sometimes Russian and Ukrainian. ", "notes": "", "contactName": "Andrea Walker", "contactPhone": "360-904-1273", "contactEmail": "andrea@welcometoonelife.com", "servicePrograms": "Nutrition Education", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Dietary Menu Options, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, Shopping Style / Client Choice, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Pet Food / Supplies, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 62, "regionName": "Clark County Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "9bf000f5-bac8-4ee4-940a-e34b2fd8f20d.png", "website": "https://www.clarkcountyfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Pacific Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "PT", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Saturday 8:30 AM-10:30 AM (We serve our clients through a number system.
